summary: This mod adds 15 new rings from earlier TES games
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]Legendary Rings[/color] Eng/Rus

[color=#ffff00]Authors[/color]:
Ronnie Magnum - meshes, textures, adaptation
Icecreamassassin - Creation Kit consultation
***

This mod adds 15 new rings from earlier TES games. They can be obtained in the following locations:

Weatherward circle - Whiterun, Hall of the Dead
Enchantment:
Fire and Frost Resistance increased by 45%.

Jewel of the Rumare - Blackreach, Synderion's lab
Enchantment:
Stamina recovers 25% faster. Allows to breath underwater.

Ring of the Gray - Riften, Mercer's house
Enchantment:
Fortifies Sneak by 20. Bows causes 20% more damage. Increases Poison Resistance by 25%.

Ring of Eidolon's Edge - Ratway, Esbern's den
Enchantment:
One-handed weapons causes 20% more damage. Block 20% more damage with your shield.

Black Band - Shrine of Mehrunes Dagon
Enchantment:
Fortifies Lockpicking and Light Armor by 15. Magic Resistance increased by 10%.

Denstagmer's ring - Silent Moons Camp
Enchantment:
Fire, Frost and Lightning Resistance increased by 30%.

Engraved ring of Healing - Septimius Segonius' Outpost
Enchantment:
Health regenerates 20% faster. Restoration spells cost reduced by 20%.

Ring of Vipereye - Midden, upper level
Enchantment:
Stamina increased by 45. Magic Resistance increased by 10%.

Ring of Surroundings - Dead Men's Respite
Enchantment:
Fortifies Sneak by 20. Wearer is muffled and moves silently.

Aesliip's Ring - Hamvir's Rest
Enchantment:
Increases Magic Resistance by 10 %. Increases Magicka by 75.

Ring of Sunfire - Orotheim
Enchantment:
Poison and Disease Resistance increased by 25%. Magic Resistance increased by 10%.

Ring of Khajiit - Halldir's Cairn
Enchantment:
Lockpicking and Pickpocket are 15% better. Backstab does double damage.

Ring of the Wind - Anise's Cabin Cellar
Enchantment:
Increases the movement speed.

Ring of the Iron Fist - Bilegulch Mine
Enchantment:
Unarmed strikes do 15 additional damage. Stamina regenerates 50% faster.

Circlet of Omnipotence - Skybound Pass
Enchantment:
Health, Stamina and Magicka increased by 25. All weapons deals 15 more damage. All spells cost 10% less. Magic Resistance increased by 5%.

***

[color=#ffff00]!!!USE ONLY 1 ESP-FILE!!![/color]

***
